title: There’s A Huge Fracture Coming (Ep 1677)
description:
Of all the ridiculous liberal media clips I’ve seen, this one from “The View” takes the cake. In this episode, I address the left’s alternate reality about elections, January 6th, and political violence. 

News Picks:


Georgia officials open an investigation into potential fraud in the 2020 election.

Woke universities offering cash to professors to get more woke.

Woke ideology presents a real threat to the medical profession. 


Rumble launches its own advertising marketplace.


Virginia’s incoming Republican Governor gets blamed for the current Democrat Governor’s failure to act in the storm crisis. 

Is Biden limiting the supply of monoclonal antibodies to red states?
